folder: Boston Road & Southern Boulevard, Bronx, NY
text:
Boston Road, south from its intersection with Southern Boulevard, showing the Hunt Residence. During the War for Independence.Washington held an important conference with a spy here. The house was later demolished and on its site was erected a 2-story brick building bearing
Nos. 1723-1737.
1899.
Gift of Randall Comfort.

folder: Boston Road & Southern Boulevard, Bronx, NY
text:
1723 to 1753 (empty lot, foreground) Boston Road, west side, adjoining and at (left to right) its intersection with Southern Boulevard, showing excavation work in progress on the site on which were later erected two 2-story and two 1-story brick buildings. In the background appear the
rears of buildings facing on Crotona Park East.
July 31, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

Piles for removal
Southern Blvd. E. 174th St.
Publication Subject to Written Permission or Invoice Hiraa Hyers
Photo by Mr. A. Tennyson Beals Emergency Work Bureau
1331
